SEARCH
Package BusinessLayer

Class Item

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.Item
public class Item extends Object
The Item class represents an item in an order. It is associated with a product and includes information such as quantity ordered, whether it is packed, and the total price.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Item()
    Constructs an empty Item.
    Item(int quantityorder)
    Constructs a new Item with the specified quantity ordered.
    Item(Product product, int quantityOrdered)
    Constructs a new Item with the specified product and quantity ordered.
